**As a** [persona/role]  
 **I want to** [action/function]  
 **So that** [business benefit]  
   
 ### Details and Assumptions
 * [document what you know]
   
 ### Acceptance Criteria  
   
 ```gherkin
 Given that [some context]
 When [certain action is taken]
 Then [the outcome of action is observed]
 ```
